title: Karlie Kloss cuts a classic look in black and white as she and hubby Joshua Kushner get lunch in NYC
text:
Karlie Kloss and husband Joshua Kushner have officially celebrated their first year of marriage.

And the happy couple appears to be just as in love now as they were on their wedding day.

Kloss cut a classic look in black and white Monday as she joined her husband for lunch in New York City.

Lunch date: Karlie Kloss cut a classic look in black and white Monday as she joined her husband Joshua Kushner for lunch in New York City

She sported a short-sleeved casual block top, which she wore tucked into a white midi skirt.

The skirt was adorned with a random black polka-dotted print, worn over black stockings with black leather booties.

She completed the look with a pair of black Celine wayfarers, some petite gold hoop earrings and a matching pendant necklace.

The 27-year-old draped a navy coat over her arm as she held a cup of coffee in one hand and her husband's hand in the other.

Kushner, 34, sported a navy blue topcoat, layered over a grey sweater, layered over a white button-down shirt, paired with slim black pants and matching sneakers.

Kloss recently took to Instagram with photos from their wedding, which took place October 18, 2018.

She posted a photo of herself in white, kissing her groom, which she captioned: '365.'

Dior dress: Kloss also shared a video documenting the making of her custom Christian Dior wedding dress, designed by creative director Maria Grazia

The couple was married in upstate New York, having a second wedding celebration this June in Wyoming.

Kloss also shared a video documenting the making of her custom Christian Dior wedding dress, designed by creative director Maria Grazia.

She and Kushner began dating in 2012, announcing their engagement in July of 2018, shortly after she converted to Judaism, Kushner's faith.
